title: XDM Business Marketing List Members
description: XDM Business Marketing List Members is a standard Experience Data Model (XDM) class that describes members, persons, or contacts associated with a marketing list. This XDM class can only be included in the profile for customers with the B2B or B2P Edition.

xdm:marketingListMemberID.title: Marketing List Member ID
xdm:marketingListMemberID.description: Unique ID for the membership of this person to this marketing list.

xdm:marketingListMemberKey.title: Marketing List Member Key
xdm:marketingListMemberKey.description: Unique composite identifier of the membership of this person from the marketing list.

xdm:personID.title: Person Identifier
xdm:personID.description: Unique ID for the person who is a member of this marketing list.

xdm:personKey.title: Person Key
xdm:personKey.description: Unique composite identifier of the Person from the marketing list.

xdm:marketingListID.title: Marketing List Identifier
xdm:marketingListID.description: Unique ID for the marketing list this person is a member of.

xdm:marketingListKey.title: Marketing List Key
xdm:marketingListKey.description: Unique composite identifier of the Marketing List this person is a member of.
